snippet: Nick Krause, who plays Sid in "The Descendants," explains his preparation: it involves a lot of pretending he's anyone but the actual character.
abstract: Nick Krause, who plays Sid in "The Descendants," explains his preparation: it involves a lot of pretending he's anyone but the actual character.
lead_paragraph: "Everyone the whole way, for this whole thing, has been telling me, you're never going to get something that cool again," Nick Krause said of his first major feature film role, in Alexander Payne's "The Descendants," opposite George Clooney shooting in Hawaii.
